channel.title: BUpolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUpolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: House passes bill to de-list gray wolves as endangered species
item.description: Five years after gray wolves were last removed from the endangered species list, the House passed a bill to de-list the wolves again.

item.title: Gov. J.B. Pritzker draws the line as the Bears flirt with an Indiana move
item.description: Illinois Gov. J.B. Pritzker's 2028 presidential ambitions are colliding with a very local headache: the Chicago Bears' stadium saga.

item.title: Trump gives fed workers two more days off for the Christmas holiday
item.description: President Trump, who has long complained about too many federal holidays, is giving federal workers extra days off next week for the Christmas holiday...

item.title: Trump orders marijuana reform for medical use, stops short of full legalization
item.description: The pro-pot movement got its biggest federal policy win Thursday when President Trump removed marijuana from the list of most-restricted drugs and res...

item.title: Cooling inflation numbers boost Trump's economic message
item.description: Consumer prices rose at a lower-than-expected rate last month, handing President Trump an early Christmas gift and a much-needed political boost headi...

item.title: Vance tries to thread affordability needle in Rust Belt
item.description: The vice president fine-tunes Trump’s economic message, but he's only got so much wiggle room.

item.title: Ex-Trump voters swung hard to Democrats over costs in NJ & VA, new research shows
item.description: Voters who backed Donald Trump in 2024 and swung to Democrats in this year's Virginia and New Jersey elections did so over economic concerns, accordin...

item.title: Democrats think they’ve found their 2026 message — and Miami just backed it up
item.description: In races across the country, Democrats focused on promises to make life more affordable — even as they offered contrasting approaches.

item.title: Voters sour on Trump’s handling of the economy in new poll
item.description: The White House plans to make affordability a key selling point for Republicans across the board as the 2026 midterm elections come into focus.

item.title: Trump will again test ‘blame Democrats’ message on the economy — this time at a casino

item.title: CNN Wonders Why ICE Is Targeting Charlotte, N.C. Here’s Why.
item.description: ICE targets Charlotte, North Carolina due to the city’s mounting immigration problem. It is also the seat of Mecklenburg County which permits the sher...

item.title: Deterring Illegal Immigration: This Town Decided that Actions Speak Louder than Words
item.description: After approving an anti-sanctuary resolution, Worthington Hills, Kentucky is not a sanctuary for illegal aliens. To read the rest of the article click...

item.title: DHS Launches Operation River Wall to Secure Rio Grande Valley

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
